name: Are They Okay?
description:
They've gotten upset and it's your job to make sure they're okay!

Move the obstacles out of their way to make sure they get home safe.

WASD - Move the Camera

Q/E - Rotate Objects

Left Click - Pick up objects and move them

Stop signs halt them in place, allowing you some time to save them.

[Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 Jam]

Edit: Updated game download as a file was missing
